name: Echo Infusion

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

cardLoreTooltips: I’ve only just arrived and, yet, I feel as though I’ve spent a lifetime here. When I sleep, I dream of Titans I’ve never met and Divinities creating worlds on a whim. I did not know of Exiles until they revealed themselves to me, yet now I see the very crystals that made up their Shardsouls. Am I losing my mind, or worse… am I finding it again?
